ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:8}); // Johnny
“Yeah, yeah!
And you remember the time when….”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:12}); // Johnny
“Yeah.
Oh yeah, and then that time…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // {Tifa}
“Oh, right!
I remember that, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“Ha, ha…oh stop it!
That's right.
Oh really…”
createLineTrigger({x1:221, y1:3, z1:0, x2:165, y2:-2, z2:0});
createLineTrigger({x1:192, y1:135, z1:0, x2:95, y2:33, z2:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // {Cloud}
“Just remember we're leaving early tomorrow.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud},
would you mind leaving us
alone for the day?”{PAUSE}“We haven't seen each other for ages and
sometimes it's fun to talk about
old times for a change.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // Johnny
“No, no, NO!!
Meteor's getting closer every minute!!”{PAUSE}“I wanna live my life right now!!
I want to build a home
and grow old together with her!”{PAUSE}“If you can't do it, then I will!
And that's that!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna do my best,
so you hang in there too!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // Johnny
“I proposed to her in the middle of all that
Meteor stuff!”{PAUSE}“I don't care
even if the world were to end right now!”{PAUSE}“I can't think of anything else!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Johnny
“…sigh…I'm not good enough for her.
What should I do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // Johnny
“Heh, heh, heh!
She and I are getting
along pretty good.”{PAUSE}“But I'm such a pitiful waste…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Johnny
“…mumble…mumble…
({Tifa}, promise me
you're gonna be happy.)”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // Johnny
“Yeah,
don't get mad or anything.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // Johnny
“Go on and beat it!”{PAUSE}“I'm happy like this.
So keep out of my life.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // Johnny
“That's right. Long time no see.
Do you remember me?”{PAUSE}“That's okay.
We'll just pretend like
we don't know each other.”{PAUSE}“I started a new life in this town.”{PAUSE}“A lot of things happened to us.
Heh, I better stop my complaining!
I sure envy you all living
out under the stars.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // Johnny
“You think you're good enough to
brag about how big you are?”{PAUSE}“I don't wanna hear it!
Heh, no more complaining from me!”{PAUSE}“From now on, I'm turning over a new leaf!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:6}); // “I'm sorry about that.
He's had some big shocks
and has been depressed lately.”

dialogStrings: Johnny's New Home

Johnny
“What's with YOU?”

Johnny
“Hey, is it really you?”{PAUSE}“We were in SOLDIER,
and childhood friends before that.
You were such a playboy.”{PAUSE}“And a $#&^ murderer!!”{PAUSE}“Why can't I remember your name?”
{CHOICE}Who are YOU?
{CHOICE}I'm {Cloud}, and don't forget it

Johnny
“That's right. Long time no see.
Do you remember me?”{PAUSE}“That's okay.
We'll just pretend like
we don't know each other.”{PAUSE}“I started a new life in this town.”{PAUSE}“A lot of things happened to us.
Heh, I better stop my complaining!
I sure envy you all living
out under the stars.”

Johnny
“You think you're good enough to
brag about how big you are?”{PAUSE}“I don't wanna hear it!
Heh, no more complaining from me!”{PAUSE}“From now on, I'm turning over a new leaf!”

Johnny
“Go on and beat it!”{PAUSE}“I'm happy like this.
So keep out of my life.”

“I'm sorry about that.
He's had some big shocks
and has been depressed lately.”

{Tifa}
“Oh, right!
I remember that, too.”

Johnny
“Yeah, yeah!
And you remember the time when….”

{Tifa}
“Hee, hee, hee!”

Johnny
“Ha, ha, ha!”

{Tifa}
“Ha, ha…oh stop it!
That's right.
Oh really…”

Johnny
“Yeah.
Oh yeah, and then that time…”

{Tifa}
“Yeah, yeah!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud},
would you mind leaving us
alone for the day?”{PAUSE}“We haven't seen each other for ages and
sometimes it's fun to talk about
old times for a change.”

Johnny
“Yeah,
don't get mad or anything.”

{Tifa}
“I'll try not to be back too late.”{PAUSE}“So please don't worry about us!”
{CHOICE}Worry?
{CHOICE}Yeah…

{Cloud}
“I'm not worried.”

{Cloud}
“Just remember we're leaving early tomorrow.”

{Tifa}
“You're right…”

{Tifa}
“OK, I know.”

Johnny
“…mumble…mumble…
({Tifa}, promise me
you're gonna be happy.)”

Johnny
“Heh, heh, heh!
She and I are getting
along pretty good.”{PAUSE}“But I'm such a pitiful waste…”

Johnny
“…sigh…I'm not good enough for her.
What should I do?”

Johnny
“I proposed to her in the middle of all that
Meteor stuff!”{PAUSE}“I don't care
even if the world were to end right now!”{PAUSE}“I can't think of anything else!”

Johnny
“No, no, NO!!
Meteor's getting closer every minute!!”{PAUSE}“I wanna live my life right now!!
I want to build a home
and grow old together with her!”{PAUSE}“If you can't do it, then I will!
And that's that!”{PAUSE}“I'm gonna do my best,
so you hang in there too!”

“If you can't do it, then I will!
And that's that!
I'm gonna do my best,
so you hang in there too!”
